column2: # Remove countries that are not being analysed
# Transform wide data to satisfy ggplot2 long format data requirement
fertility_long_df <- gather(fertility_filtered_df, key="Year", value="Births Per Thousand", -c(Country.Name, Country.Code))
# Clean format of year column and parse Births Per Thousand as type numeric.
fertility_long_df$`Births Per Thousand` <- as.numeric(fertility_long_df$`Births Per Thousand`)
